description.value: A related person registered in the norwegian master Person index (FREG). In the case where the RelatedPerson itself is not a person registered in FREG (foreign citizen) the name, nationality, birthDate and gender is returned in the RelatedPerson instance. In all other cases only the RelatedPerson.identifier containtin FNR or DNR is returned.

definition.value: A related person registered in the norwegian master Person index (FREG). In the case where the RelatedPerson itself is not a person registered in FREG (foreign citizen) the name, nationality, birthDate and gender is returned in the RelatedPerson instance. In all other cases only the RelatedPerson.identifier containting FNR or DNR is returned. For Guardians the name and identifier is returned.

comment.value: For verge: person som varetar umyndiges interesser og opptrer som rettslig representant på umyndiges vegne i saker

definition.value:
gd-RelatedPerson: When the RelatedPerson instance is a person not registeredn in FREG (a foreign citizen) the RelatedPerson instance is identified by name, gender, birthDate and nationality.
The nationality of the person. Should be a country code from ISO 3166-1 alpha 3 code system

An identifier for this person. Should be at Fødselsnummer or D-nummer
For verger: Folkeregisteridentifikatoren til vergen hvis denne finnes i Folkeregisteret. Vergen kan være uten tilknytning til Norge og egenskapen vil være uten verdi. Fødselsnummer: personidentifikasjonsnummer for de som er, eller har vært, bosatt i Norge, samt personer som er "ikke bosatt" d-nummer: identifikasjonsnummer som tildeles personer med midlertidig tilknytning til Norge, det vil si som ikke er bosatt i Norge
Identifier for a person within a particular scope.

no-basis: Can reference no-basis-Patient, no-basis-Person or Person in addition to Patient resources. gd-RelatedPerson: Reference to the Person/Patient registered in FREG that this RelatedPerson is related to.
The patient this person is related to.

no-basis: adds slice definitions for three relationship codings from the Norwegian Folkeregisteret. Some relationships are ordered (a person is a parent of a child, the child on the other hand has a parent). Ordered relationships are always expressed from the RelatedPerson instance to the Patient/Person instance referenced in the RelatedPerson.patient element. This will usually be the EXACT OPPOSITE of the actual data recorded in FREG, as relationships in FREG is recorded with the view from the Person to the RelatedPersons.
The nature of the relationship between a patient and the related person.
Extension for representing information regarding parental responsibility parent-child or child-parent. Represents the same information awailable in the Norwegian Folkeregister.

Defines the format of norwegian human name according to norwegian regulation (lov om personnavn). gd-RelatedPerson: When the RelatedPerson instance is a person not registeredn in FREG (a foreign citizen) the RelatedPerson instance is identified by name, gender, birthDate and nationality.
For verge: Personnavnet til en verge

gd-RelatedPerson: When the RelatedPerson instance is a person not registeredn in FREG (a foreign citizen) the RelatedPerson instance is identified by name, gender, birthDate and nationality.
Administrative Gender - the gender that the person is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

gd-RelatedPerson: When the RelatedPerson instance is a person not registeredn in FREG (a foreign citizen) the RelatedPerson instance is identified by name, gender, birthDate and nationality.
The date on which the related person was born.
